author: dougm
msg: remove calls to modperl_env_unload() and modperl_perl_pp_unset_all()
in modperl_shutdown(), which are already called in modperl_sys_term

author: dougm
msg: support string values in req_override and args_how

author: dougm
msg: add modperl_const{ants}.o to mod_perl.so to make constant lookup

author: dougm
msg: lookup {DIR,SERVER}_MERGE methods at startup time to avoid method
lookup at request time if method is not defined.
use a modperl_mgv_t for faster lookup when the method is defined.
